section.airportTitle: Rent a Car Thessaloniki without security deposit - excess & Credit Card
p.intro: Our Rent a Car Thessaloniki Company offers a variety of new vehicle models at affordable prices, so you can choose the one that fully satisfies your needs (Fleet). We guarantee excellent service, provided by our friendly, polite, courteous, and very helpful staff.
p.airportHotel: You can pick up or drop off the car at the International Airport Thessaloniki / SKG (with the free shuttle service to the office, only 1.8 km away from the Airport) or at a Hotel (Airbnb) of your choice in Thessaloniki City. You can also rent your car in Chalkidiki (Kassandra, Sithonia).
p.insurance: Every car is equipped with full insurance, to be more specific, no-fault insurance which includes damages to tires, the lower part of the car, and glasses. No hidden costs, no excess – no security deposit; we don't block money on your card and no credit card is required, with unlimited kilometers and additional drivers included.
p.deposit: Book your desired category with only €49.00 down payment, and the rest will be paid upon arrival in cash or card (credit, debit).
p.premium: Choosing the Premium Member Service (€1.00/day), you gain access to additional services such as free cancellation, rebooking, modifications, and a 10% discount on your next booking.
p.reviews: If you would like to form a more complete opinion about us, take a look at our <linkReviews>Customer Reviews</linkReviews> ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️. You will have no doubt about your holidays in Greece.
